proposed_strategy.name: Single Adhyaya Chunk
proposed_strategy.description: Since the provided text (Adhyaya 2) is short, the entire Adhyaya is processed as a single, compliant chunk.

execution_plan.description: Complete Second Adhyaya (Mantras 1-15) of the Kaushitaki Brahmana Upanishad.

parsing_instructions.justification: The Adhyaya is divided into 15 sequential numerical units (Mantras, 1-15), which serve as the basic structural and semantic sections.

start_pattern.description: The start of the Mantra's main text is marked by bolded text following any bracketed sectional titles.

end_pattern.description: The end of a Mantra is marked by the numerical sequence enclosed by double danda symbols.

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: Initial titles and organizational markers (like [द्वितीयोऽध्यायः] or [प्राणस्य प्राशस्त्यम् ]) preceding the first Mantra should be treated as contextual headings or metadata.
